entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
